title: Create gaming PC peripheral showcase website

requirements.summary: Create a homepage for www.spyderstild.shop that showcases high-end gaming peripherals with sections for mice, keyboards, and monitors
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays gaming peripheral categories: mice, keyboards, and monitors
Layout is organized with clear sections for each product category
Site is accessible at the root route

file_operations.description: Update the main App component to render the homepage with hero section and product category sections for mice, keyboards, and monitors
Create HomePage component containing hero section with background image, and three product category sections (mice, keyboards, monitors) using product showcase cards
Create HeroSection component displaying the hero background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-background.dim_1920x1080.png with site title and tagline overlay
Create ProductCategorySection component that accepts category title, banner image path, and product cards as props to display organized product sections

requirements.summary: Implement a bold, futuristic visual theme with dark backgrounds, neon accents, sharp geometric shapes, and modern gaming-inspired typography throughout the entire website
acceptanceCriteria: Dark color scheme with vibrant neon accent colors (avoid blue and purple)
Modern, tech-inspired typography consistent across all pages
Cohesive futuristic aesthetic applied to all components

file_operations.description: Define CSS variables for dark backgrounds (near-black grays), neon accent colors (neon green, cyan, orange, red), and import modern gaming-inspired fonts (e.g., Orbitron, Rajdhani, or similar tech fonts)

Extend Tailwind theme with custom colors for dark backgrounds and neon accents (avoiding blue and purple), add custom font families for futuristic typography, and configure utilities for sharp geometric shapes

requirements.summary: Create product showcase sections with visual cards for gaming mice, keyboards, and monitors with placeholder product information
acceptanceCriteria: Each product category has dedicated showcase section
Product cards display placeholder images, names, and brief descriptions
Cards follow the futuristic design theme

file_operations.description: Create ProductCard component displaying placeholder product image, name, and brief description with futuristic card styling, sharp borders, neon accent hover effects, and geometric design elements
Create products data file containing placeholder product information arrays for mice, keyboards, and monitors with product names, descriptions, and placeholder image references

requirements.summary: Add navigation header with site branding for Spyderstild and links to product category sections
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links to mice, keyboards, and monitors sections
Header remains visible and follows futuristic design theme

file_operations.description: Create Header component displaying the Spyderstild logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/spyderstild-logo.dim_400x120.png and navigation links to mice, keyboards, and monitors sections with futuristic styling, dark background, and neon accents
Wire the Header component into the App layout above the HomePage component to ensure it remains visible across the site

requirements.summary: Generate rendered images of the generated hero background, product category banners, and Spyderstild logo as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are saved to frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images are referenced in the frontend code using correct paths
All generated images render correctly in the UI

file_operations.description: Reference the generated hero background image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-background.dim_1920x1080.png as the background for the hero section
Reference the generated Spyderstild logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/spyderstild-logo.dim_400x120.png in the header branding

Reference the generated category banner images at frontend/public/assets/generated/mice-banner.dim_800x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/keyboard-banner.dim_800x400.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/monitor-banner.dim_800x400.png in their respective category sections
